name: Injunctions
text: [§486B-5]  Injunctions.  Any person who violates this chapter may be enjoined by the circuit court by a mandatory injunction or temporary restraining order necessary or proper to effectuate the purposes of this chapter in a suit brought by the attorney general in the name of the State or by any private person in the person's own name. [L 2006, c 78, pt of §21]
